about_the_game:
Ahoy Ylands Supporters!

We are grateful for the wonderful community that has formed around Ylands. Your support has brought the game where it is now and for that we are incredibly thankful!

If you can't get enough of Ylands and want to support the game even further, this pack is made for you!

Bragging rights are included in the pack as well as these cosmetic items:

• C.A.G. Benefactor" in-game title
• Noble Wave" in-game emote
• C.A.G. Admiral Uniform" in-game costume
• Baroque Frame" player avatar frame


This pack is the only way to obtain these cosmetic items.

, where we have a "Supporters only" room set up just for you!

Enjoy your new cosmetics, continue sailing the high seas and as our supporters you'll always...

Stay Classy, Ylanders!



*Note: this pack can be purchased only once.

name: Ylands - Supporter Pack
short_description: Indulge in exclusive aesthetic and show off your support of the game with this pack full of unique cosmetic items. The cosmetic items included in this Supporter pack cannot be obtained in any other way.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, French, Italian, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
